quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your task for today is to recover the latchkey from the bowl.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a lounge.

 You scan the room, seeing a bar. The bar is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bar you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. This always happens![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into an office.

 You can see a trunk. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the restroom. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so usual all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the pantry.

 You can make out a case.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if] Were you looking for a workbench? Because look over there, it's a workbench. The workbench is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've entered a dish-pit.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You are in a cookery. A standard kind of place.

 You make out a refrigerator.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You arrive in a parlor. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can make out a display.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The display contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The display is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookhouse.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a freezer.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've entered a scullery.

 You see a fridge.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a pan. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the pan.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. An ordinary kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchenette. A typical kind of place. The room is well lit.

 Look over there! a rack. [if there is something on the s_3]On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You swear loudly.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. An usual one.

 You make out a shelf. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_4]On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a vault.

 You see a toolbox.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe nearby.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The safe is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a laundromat.

 You see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_9]. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... drawer?[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The drawer is empty![end if] You can make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_5]On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
I am honoured to announce that you are now in the canteen.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a bowl. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bowl you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've entered a closet. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You scan the room, seeing a suitcase. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Hey, want to see a crate? Look over there, a crate.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The crate is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the playroom.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. A typical one.

 You see [if c_12 is locked]a locked[else if c_12 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet right there by you.[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_12]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You're now in a spare room.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it is what it is, a portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it's a durable door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it's an ominous gateway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: suitcase
infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: crate
infos.desc: The crate looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: refrigerator
infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: freezer
infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: toolbox
infos.desc: The toolbox looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: drawer
infos.desc: The drawer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: broccoli
infos.desc: The broccoli looks appetizing.

infos.name: keycard
infos.desc: The keycard looks useful

infos.name: bar
infos.desc: The bar is solid.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is balanced.

infos.name: pan
infos.desc: The pan is reliable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is balanced.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is unstable.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is balanced.

infos.name: bowl
infos.desc: The bowl is reliable.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the latchkey is satin.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please recover the latchkey from the bowl.
